snippet: Their attendance at the Assembly of States Parties at the United Nations is seen as symbolic but significant in light of the Palestinians’ hopes for statehood.
abstract: Palestinians become observer for first time at annual meeting of states that have joined International Criminal Court, upgrading their status within the organization.
lead_paragraph: Their attendance at the Assembly of States Parties at the United Nations is seen as symbolic but significant in light of the Palestinians’ hopes for statehood.

headline.main: Palestinians Become Observers at Meeting on International Criminal Court
headline.print_headline: Palestinians Attend Annual Gathering of International Court as Observers
